strapiPost.title: Get a Look at Eternity
strapiPost.content:
One of the world's largest paintings is on display in Rogers. Eternity is a 100 foot wide 12 foot tall canvas painting on display at the Rogers Experimental House. 

  • About the artist: Ibiyinka Alao is a United Nations art ambassador from Nigeria participating in a 6-week residency hosted by the Rogers Lowell Area Chamber and supported by the Tyson Family Foundation.
  • Ibiyinka began working on the painting 2 years ago. Eternity tells over a dozen different stories about new mornings, learnings, and more on the single, massive canvas.

Quote: "His message is sharing forgiveness, sharing love..." You can find out more about his time in Rogers HERE.
